==Importance==
==Importance==
â
Since only the fovea provides sharp distinct vision, the eye must move to follow a target. It must be precise and fast. This is seen in scenarios like reading, wherein the reader must shift gaze constantly, or following a small object like a golf ball, in which the extraocular muscles must lead the eye to follow the head movements. Although under voluntary control, most movement is done without thinking, such as those based on head or other body movement, or movement of objects in the area. Researchers still have some work in order to find the parallel nature of the environment-based (involuntary) and voluntary control.<ref name="eye, human">"eye, human."EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica from EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica 2006 Ultimate Reference Suite DVD 2009</ref>
+
Since only the fovea provides sharp distinct vision, the eye must move to follow a target. It must be precise and fast. This is seen in scenarios like reading, wherein the reader must shift gaze constantly, or following a small object like a golf ball, in which the extraocular muscles must lead the eye to follow the head movements. Although under voluntary control, most movement is done without thinking, such as those based on head or other body movement, or movement of objects in the area. Researchers still have some work in order to find the parallel nature of the environment-based (involuntary) and voluntary control.<ref name="eye, human">"eye, human."EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica from [[EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica 2006 Ultimate Reference Suite DVD]] 2009</ref>
